alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 11 at 2:55PM CST until December 12 at 10:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...El Paso metro area and the lower Rio Grande Valley to the southeast. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM MST Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few of these areas outside the metro area have seen brief freezing temperatures this past week, but tonight the freeze will be colder and more widespread.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Western El Paso County
